channel.title: How To on GW Robotics
channel.description: Recent content in How To on GW Robotics

item.title: HOW-TO: Arduino with Raspberry Pi
item.description: The 2017 robot will be interacting between the Arduino (for sensor reading and PWM output) and the Raspberry Pi through a Python module called Nanpy. The purpose of this how-to is for basic setup and usage that may not be completely obvious from Nanpy’s official documentation. We will be using repositories from the GW Robotics organisation as a way to standardise everyone’s code bases. Arduino Setup Please note, this is only necessary if the Arduino does not already have the Nanpy firmware compiled on it.
